glsa.title: exFAT: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been found in exFAT allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

background.p: A full-featured exFAT file system implementation for Unix-like systems.

description.p: Two vulnerabilities were found in exFAT. A malformed input can cause a write heap overflow or cause an endless loop.

impact.p: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All exFAT users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Heap overflow and endless loop in exfatfsck / exfat-utils
